level.heading: Sales at retail.
level.text: ยง 20-677 Sales at retail. It shall be unlawful for any person to sell or offer for sale, at retail, any pickled, pumped, cured, or otherwise processed meats or meat products which shall contain added curing solution or any other liquid more than ten percent, by weight, of the total weight of the meat, except that pickled, pumped, cured, or otherwise processed beef brisket shall not contain more than twenty percent, by weight, of added curing solution or any other liquid.
